property.name: sqlQuery
property.value:
SELECT cf.cm_case_number, cf.cm_case_title, cf.cm_case_type, cf.cm_case_status, cf.cm_case_details, cf.cm_case_incident_date, cf.cm_case_created, au.cm_full_name, cf.cm_case_modified, aum.cm_full_name, cf.cm_case_closed, cf.cm_case_disposition, cf.cm_case_priority, cf.cm_due_date, cf.cm_courtroom_name, cf.cm_next_court_date, cf.cm_responsible_organization, COALESCE(p.cm_person_title, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_given_name, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_middle_name, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_family_name, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_person_hair_color, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_person_eye_color, ''), p.cm_person_height_inches, p.cm_person_weight_pounds, p.cm_person_date_of_birth, COALESCE(p.cm_place_of_birth, ''), p.cm_person_date_married, COALESCE(addr.cm_street_address, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_street_address_extra, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_locality, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_region, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_postal_code, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_country, ''), COALESCE(orgs.cm_organization_type, ''), COALESCE(orgs.cm_organization_value, ''), COALESCE(MAX(contactsPhone.cm_contact_value), ''), COALESCE(MAX(contactsFax.cm_contact_value), ''), COALESCE(MAX(contactsEmail.cm_contact_value), ''), COALESCE(aliases.cm_person_alias_type, ''), COALESCE(aliases.cm_person_alias_value, ''), CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE FROM acm_case_file cf
JOIN acm_person_assoc pa ON cf.cm_case_id = pa.cm_person_assoc_parent_id AND cf.cm_object_type = pa.cm_person_assoc_parent_type
JOIN acm_person p ON pa.cm_person_assoc_person_id = p.cm_person_id
LEFT JOIN acm_person_postal_address paddr ON p.cm_person_id = paddr.cm_person_id LEFT JOIN acm_postal_address addr ON paddr.cm_address_id = addr.cm_address_id
LEFT JOIN acm_person_organization porgs ON p.cm_person_id = porgs.cm_person_id LEFT JOIN acm_organization orgs ON porgs.cm_organization_id = orgs.cm_organization_id
LEFT JOIN acm_person_contact_method pcontacts ON p.cm_person_id = pcontacts.cm_person_id LEFT JOIN acm_contact_method contactsPhone ON pcontacts.cm_contact_method_id = contactsPhone.cm_contact_method_id AND contactsPhone.cm_contact_type = 'phone' LEFT JOIN acm_contact_method contactsFax ON pcontacts.cm_contact_method_id = contactsFax.cm_contact_method_id AND contactsFax.cm_contact_type = 'fax' LEFT JOIN acm_contact_method contactsEmail ON pcontacts.cm_contact_method_id = contactsEmail.cm_contact_method_id AND contactsEmail.cm_contact_type = 'email'
LEFT JOIN acm_person_alias aliases ON p.cm_person_id = aliases.cm_person_id
LEFT JOIN acm_user au ON cf.cm_case_creator = au.cm_user_id
LEFT JOIN acm_user aum ON cf.cm_case_modifier = aum.cm_user_id
WHERE cf.cm_case_id = ?1
AND cf.cm_case_id = pa.cm_person_assoc_parent_id AND pa.cm_person_assoc_parent_type = 'CASE_FILE' AND pa.cm_person_assoc_person_type = 'Initiator' GROUP BY cf.cm_case_number

SELECT cm.cm_complaint_number, cm.cm_complaint_title, cm.cm_complaint_type, cm.cm_complaint_status, cm.cm_complaint_details, cm.cm_complaint_incident_date, cm.cm_complaint_created, au.cm_full_name, cm.cm_complaint_modified, aum.cm_full_name, d.cm_close_date, COALESCE(d.cm_disposition_type, ''), COALESCE(d.cm_refer_ext_org_name, ''), COALESCE(d.cm_refer_ext_person_name, ''), cm.cm_due_date, COALESCE(p.cm_person_title, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_given_name, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_middle_name, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_family_name, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_person_hair_color, ''), COALESCE(p.cm_person_eye_color, ''), p.cm_person_height_inches, p.cm_person_weight_pounds, p.cm_person_date_of_birth, COALESCE(p.cm_place_of_birth, ''), p.cm_person_date_married, COALESCE(addr.cm_street_address, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_street_address_extra, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_locality, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_region, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_postal_code, ''), COALESCE(addr.cm_country, ''), COALESCE(orgs.cm_organization_type, ''), COALESCE(orgs.cm_organization_value, ''), COALESCE(MAX(contactsPhone.cm_contact_value), ''), COALESCE(MAX(contactsFax.cm_contact_value), ''), COALESCE(MAX(contactsEmail.cm_contact_value), ''), COALESCE(aliases.cm_person_alias_type, ''), COALESCE(aliases.cm_person_alias_value, ''), CURRENT_DATE FROM acm_complaint cm
JOIN acm_person_assoc pa ON cm.cm_complaint_id = pa.cm_person_assoc_parent_id AND cm.cm_object_type = pa.cm_person_assoc_parent_type
JOIN acm_person p ON pa.cm_person_assoc_person_id = p.cm_person_id
LEFT JOIN acm_person_postal_address paddr ON p.cm_person_id = paddr.cm_person_id LEFT JOIN acm_postal_address addr ON paddr.cm_address_id = addr.cm_address_id
LEFT JOIN acm_person_organization porgs ON p.cm_person_id = porgs.cm_person_id LEFT JOIN acm_organization orgs ON porgs.cm_organization_id = orgs.cm_organization_id
LEFT JOIN acm_person_contact_method pcontacts ON p.cm_person_id = pcontacts.cm_person_id LEFT JOIN acm_contact_method contactsPhone ON pcontacts.cm_contact_method_id = contactsPhone.cm_contact_method_id AND contactsPhone.cm_contact_type = 'phone' LEFT JOIN acm_contact_method contactsFax ON pcontacts.cm_contact_method_id = contactsFax.cm_contact_method_id AND contactsFax.cm_contact_type = 'fax' LEFT JOIN acm_contact_method contactsEmail ON pcontacts.cm_contact_method_id = contactsEmail.cm_contact_method_id AND contactsEmail.cm_contact_type = 'email'
LEFT JOIN acm_person_alias aliases ON p.cm_person_id = aliases.cm_person_id
LEFT JOIN acm_user au ON cm.cm_complaint_creator = au.cm_user_id
LEFT JOIN acm_user aum ON cm.cm_complaint_modifier = aum.cm_user_id
LEFT JOIN acm_disposition d ON cm.cm_complaint_id = d.cm_disposition_id
WHERE cm.cm_complaint_id = ?1
AND cm.cm_complaint_id = pa.cm_person_assoc_parent_id AND pa.cm_person_assoc_parent_type = 'COMPLAINT' AND pa.cm_person_assoc_person_type = 'Initiator' GROUP BY cm.cm_complaint_number
